hero.title: Join the Open Source Communities in Asia!

content.body:
## About the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC

**[REGISTER](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/#registration=1) | [한국 거주자 개인 티켓 구매](https://openinfra.cafe24.com/surl/O/18) | [SPONSOR](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/sponsors/) | [THE SCHEDULE](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule) | [TRAVEL ](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/travel-information/) | [MEET THE TEAM](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/who-we-are/)**

*This [schedule](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule) is a draft and only reflects OpenInfra Summit Asia sessions. OCP Summit Asia, Ceph Days Asia and OpenInfra Forum sessions are still being added. Session times are subject to change.*

#### \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

The OpenInfra Summit Asia and OCP Regional Summit APAC are two community-powered events co-located at the [Suwon Convention Center](https://www.scc.or.kr/site-map/) in Suwon, South Korea this year! To build the next decade of open infrastructure, OpenInfra Summits will be developed by the community for the community. 

These events are being organized by the OpenInfra and OCP Korea community organizers in collaboration with fellow organizers from various countries in Asia. 

Join the leading open source software and hardware communities on September 3 & 4, 2024 in Suwon, South Korea. In addition to sessions on projects directly supported by the [OpenInfra Foundation](https://openinfra.dev/)—OpenStack, StarlingX, Kata Containers, Airship, and Zuul—the OpenInfra Summit will be co-located with the [Open Compute Project (OCP)](https://www.opencompute.org/), a collaborative community focused on redesigning hardware technology to efficiently support the growing demands on compute infrastructure. 

##### [](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/who-we-are/)**[REGISTER](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/#registration=1) | [한국 거주자 개인 티켓 구매](https://openinfra.cafe24.com/surl/O/18) | [SPONSOR](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/sponsors/) | [THE SCHEDULE](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule) | [TRAVEL ](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/travel-information/) | [MEET THE TEAM](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/who-we-are/)**

#### \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

### [Registration](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/#registration=1)

The OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC will be a limited-capacity, sellout event. 

Full Access Pass: $60 USD

**[한국 거주자 개인 티켓 구매](https://openinfra.cafe24.com/surl/O/18)**

단체 티켓 구매는 \*\*[support@openinfradays.kr](mailto:support@openinfradays.kr) 로 문의주시기 바랍니다

If you need a visa invitation letter to attend the event, please [follow this link](https://openstack.dooray.com/share/pages/fQ5wJlvuRZuRWuKZIvMARw).

By registering for the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC, your contact information may be shared with the event sponsors. You can opt out by emailing [summit@openinfra.dev](mailto:summit@openinfra.dev). 

#### \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

### [The Schedule](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule)

***This [schedule](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule) is a draft and only reflects OpenInfra Summit Asia talks. OCP Summit Asia and Ceph Days Asia talks are still being added. Session times are subject to change.***

OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC attendees will engage in 100+ sessions around infrastructure use cases like cloud computing, edge computing, hardware enablement, and security. The event is focused on helping users compose, integrate, and operate these different technologies to solve real problems at scale.

There will also be a strong focus on over 30 other open-source technologies relevant to infrastructure operators, including Linux, Kubernetes, Docker, Ansible, Ceph, Istio, Envoy, OpenContrail, ONAP and many more.

#### \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

### [Code of Conduct](https://openinfra.dev/legal/code-of-conduct)

We are a diverse community of professionals, and the OpenInfra Summit Asia | OCP Regional Summit APAC organizers are dedicated to providing an inclusive and safe Summit experience for everyone. View the [OpenInfra Summit Code of Conduct](https://openinfra.dev/legal/code-of-conduct) for more information.

#### \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

##### **[REGISTER](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/#registration=1) | [한국 거주자 개인 티켓 구매](https://openinfra.cafe24.com/surl/O/18) | [SPONSOR](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/sponsors/) | [THE SCHEDULE](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/a/schedule) | [TRAVEL ](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/travel-information/) | [MEET THE TEAM](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/who-we-are/)**[](https://2024.openinfraasia.org/who-we-are/)
